Hi,

I'm new to Heritrix, and keep having this same problem. I've tried the=

1.12 and 1.13 versions, but get the same results.

All the domains I enter=
 into the seed list won't resolve. The crawler
reports the below exception.=


All these domains to resolve if I do it manually. I've tried clearing
my =
DNS cache, and I can ping them without a problem.

I want to debug the appl=
ication, but I don't know if NetBeans supports
the maven build project that=
's being used.

Has anyone got Heritrix running under NetBeans?

Here's the=
 exception ->
